job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Lead Pega DevOps Engineer in our organisation, you will spearhead our FEC initiatives, driving the design and implementation of Pega-based solutions. You will have the unique opportunity to make a significant impact on our systems and processes. You will lead and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders and developers, to deliver state-of-the-art systems that enhance operational efficiency and ensure regulatory compliance. Your responsibilities will include among others:
          + Leading end-to-end Pega project implementations, including solution design, system configuration, and integration.
          + Translating business requirements into scalable and robust Pega-based solutions.
          + Collaborating with stakeholders to gather functional and technical requirements, ensuring alignment with project objectives.
          + Mentoring and guiding (a) team(s) of skilled Pega developers, fostering a culture of innovation, and promoting professional growth.
          + Conducting thorough system testing, identifying and resolving issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
          + Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and Pega platform updates, bringing innovative ideas to the table.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Pega Devops Engineer

As a Lead Pega DevOps Engineer in our organisation, you will spearhead our FEC initiatives, driving the design and implementation of Pega-based solutions. You will have the unique opportunity to make a significant impact on our systems and processes. You will lead and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders and developers, to deliver state-of-the-art systems that enhance operational efficiency and ensure regulatory compliance. Your responsibilities will include among others:
          + Leading end-to-end Pega project implementations, including solution design, system configuration, and integration.
          + Translating business requirements into scalable and robust Pega-based solutions.
          + Collaborating with stakeholders to gather functional and technical requirements, ensuring alignment with project objectives.
          + Mentoring and guiding (a) team(s) of skilled Pega developers, fostering a culture of innovation, and promoting professional growth.
          + Conducting thorough system testing, identifying and resolving issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
          + Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and Pega platform updates, bringing innovative ideas to the table.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Pega development and DevOps practices within that specific platform, rather than general AI/ML engineering. While it mentions 'emerging technologies', the core responsibilities and required skills do not align with the profiles of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Translating business requirements into scalable and robust Pega-based solutions
Collaborating with stakeholders to gather functional and technical requirements, ensuring alignment with project objectives
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions, which is a core aspect of Business Understanding.

phrases: Leading end-to-end Pega project implementations, including solution design, system configuration, and integration
job_tasks.justification: The focus on Pega project implementations, solution design, system configuration, and integration falls under the umbrella of software development, specifically within the Pega platform.

phrases: driving the design and implementation of Pega-based solutions
job_tasks.justification: The job title explicitly mentions 'DevOps Engineer' and the responsibilities include ensuring system performance, reliability, and compliance, which are key aspects of Operations Engineering, albeit specific to the Pega platform.

phrases: lead and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders and developers
Collaborating with stakeholders to gather functional and technical requirements
soft_skills.justification: These phrases highlight the need for close collaboration with various teams and stakeholders, indicating strong communication and collaboration skills.

phrases: identifying and resolving issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability
soft_skills.justification: The responsibility to identify and resolve issues points to problem-solving abilities and a pragmatic approach to ensuring system functionality.

phrases: bring innovative ideas to the table
Mentoring and guiding (a) team(s) of skilled Pega developers
soft_skills.justification: Phrases like 'spearhead', 'innovative ideas', 'culture of innovation', and 'mentoring' suggest a proactive, ownership-driven, and innovative mindset.

phrases: Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and Pega platform updates
soft_skills.justification: The requirement to stay updated with industry trends and platform updates demonstrates the need for continuous learning and adaptability.
